title: Third week of SBF trial details lavish spending of customer funds on real estate, endorsements, and more
description:
The third week of Sam Bankman-Fried‘s (SBF) trial started with more explosive revelations as former FTX engineering director Nishad Singh took the stand to testify against the former billionaire. Following Singh’s confession and revelations, forensic accountants and FTX‘s former general counsel took the stand to give more insight into the misuse of customer funds between […]

The post Third week of SBF trial details lavish spending of customer funds on real estate, endorsements, and more appeared first on CryptoSlate.
